body.name: Deco Home Fully Automatic Portable Washing Machine, 1.8 cu. ft., 16lb Capacity, 10 Smart Cleaning Programs, Water Inlet and Drain Pump
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20. Order within 8 hrs 15 mins
features: SAVE SPACE, SAVE TIME - Perfect for smaller living areas that don’t have the space for a full-size washing machine, the Deco Home 16LB Portable Automatic Washing Machine is a great solution for compact spaces such as apartments, dorms, and more. Enjoy fully automatic and carefree washing utilizing its many features found on larger machines.

POWERFUL HIGH CAPACITY - Able to wash up to 16 pounds of laundry at a time, power through, shirts, jeans, socks, and much more without having to trek to your closest laundromat. A sturdy steel inner tub agitates and spins clothes removing odors and deeply engrained stains.

EASY SETUP - With 10 smart cleaning programs, this washing machine is simple to use. Ensure you are within the weight limit, make sure your clothes are evenly distributed and select desired cleaning modes ranging from delicate to heavy duty.

DRY AND DRAIN - When you’re done washing, this washer is able to run spin dry programs to remove most of the water in your clothes allowing for faster times when hang drying. An attached drain hose is easily set into a sink or tub drain to remove dirty water hassle-free. We also include a water inlet installation kit so the machine can automatically draw water when in use!

PIECE OF MIND - Complete with plenty of safety features, this washing machine uses child safety locks, unbalance detection to protect the integrity of the appliance, and auto-shutoff. Follow the included user guide and you’ll be able to focus on clean clothes instead of frustration and trips to the laundromat.

PLEASE NOTE: Each machine is thoroughly tested for quality before it is packaged and shipped. Some customers may experience seeing some leftover water or condensation from this test. Feel free to run a wash cycle before your first use if necessary!

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Previous page Skip the laundry room, save space The compact size of this portable washing machine makes it an ideal choice where space is a premium. More time for uh... studying Eliminate the need to visit a communal laundry room or off-campus laundromat, saving valuable time! Convenience of bathrooms Bathrooms have water sources and drains making it convenient to connect the washing machine Laundry on the go! Having a portable washing machine means you can do laundry wherever you park your camper or RV Next page 1 Apartments 2 Dorms 3 Bathrooms 4 RV and Camper

Why is there a small amount of water or condensation in my washing machine? Each machine is thoroughly tested for quality before it is packaged and shipped. Some, not all, customers may experience seeing some leftover water or condensation from this test. Feel free to run a wash cycle before your first use if necessary! How much laundry can I fit in this machine in one load? Up to 16 pounds. The included instruction manual features a guide that gives an estimate for each type of clothing. It's important to adhere to this guide otherwise you risk damaging the machine. How do the controls work? The control panel is operated with push buttons. We include a user guide that instructs how to use this washing machine and it's different programs. How do I connect the water inlet hose? Our provided water inlet hose brings in fresh water directly from your kitchen or bathroom faucet. It's important to note that the hose uses a G 1/2" thread connection, pictured in the photo gallery. Adapters (sold separately) may be necessary.

Product Specifications Rated Wash/Spin Capacity: 16lbs/1.8 cu. ft. Wash\Spin Power: 310W Weight: 41.9 lb Product Dimensions: 19.7 x 19.9 x 33.7 in Washing programs: 10 Water levels: 4 Washer Lid Material: Plastic lid Fuzzy Control: YES Child Lock: YES Air Dry: YES Cabinet Material: Plastic Damping Lid: NO Motor Type: Copper-Clad Aluminium Motor Water Inlet: 1 Water Outlet: 1

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 8, 2024
reviews.reviewText: tamaño perfecto para un apartamento y muy eficiente ideal para yn regalo

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Nice, but leaks, and cannot get an exchange
reviews.reviewText: Very nice little machine. It leaks a little from the bottom- I wanted to exchange because it’s a nice machine. They don’t accept exchanges- I have to return and buy again- not a big deal, but the company should be reaching out and trying to help me with exchange. Hence the one star.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works Good, But Need to Pay Attention!
reviews.reviewText: This washer works well and is fairly quiet. The only thing is you have to pay attention! TWICE the drain hose “jumped” out of the bath tub while on the spin cycle and drained water all over the floor. It’s my fault…but just a warning to those who buy it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 31, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Squeaky sound while washing machine in use. Other things were okay. Drain pipe is short.
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. Squeaky sound while washing machine in use. Other things were okay. Drain pipe is short and weird location of power line, water supply line and drain pipe.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for One
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. This is a wonderful little washer and perfect for one person's everyday items. It's very simple to use. I would have given it higher rating if the hoses for water intake and drainage were much longer.I purchased a compact appliance dolly to sit the washer on, raised it up several inches. Plus super easy to more when I need. (Get one you won't regret it)Overall I have done about 10 or 12 loads so far and have been very pleased.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 31, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars really Great Value
reviews.reviewText: powerful and smart washer , easy to use , smooth operation sound , really amazing experience .

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Simple and light
reviews.reviewText: I returned this product, it is very simple and light.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Longer electric cord and drain hose
reviews.reviewText: Alot bigger then my other portable washer. It just needs longer electric cord and hose. I was able to manage by using the water hose from other washer and a few zip ties for the drain hose.
